summary: \"Offense is the best defense.\" --- This MOD adds three kinds of Super Cheat Weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Super Cheat Weapons
Version: 1.0
Date: 14/04/2012
Author: m0m

Description
===========
This MOD adds three kinds of Super Cheat Weapons.
It is put on the table in the Helgen Keep.
For prevention of level-up, the weapon skill does not rise.

 \"Offense is the best defense.\"

Have fun!


Install
=======
Simply extract to the \"..\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\\" folder.
Then, enable \"Super Cheat Weapons.esp\" in the Skyrim launcher.


Uninstall
=========
Simply delete following a file.
\"..\\Skyrim\\Data\\Super Cheat Weapons.esp\"


Release Info
============
v1.0 (14/04/2011) - Initial release

author: m0m
